title: Dramacon, Vol. 3
description: People say the best way to cure a crush on someone is get to know them. Will Matt and Christie's love survive their first "date"?Now college students, Christie and Bethany are back to pimp their comic at the Yattacon, and Bethany is glowing with pride because her designs are on every T-shirt at the con! But while Christie is thrilled to be back hanging out with the wacky crows from Firebird Studios, one thing after another keeps her from getting together with Matt. Could it be that these two are just not destined to be together?
author: Svetlana Chmakova
